name: DALL-E
description: Prompt structure with examples for interacting with the model
rules: Comma (,) could be changed interchangeably with 'as' at the end of the phrase
Synonyms may work as expected such as using 'single line' instead of 'one-line drawing'
Styles could start the phrase or end it with comma

tokens.name: style
tokens.description: It mentions a style to be used in the generation of the image

tokens.name: material-type
tokens.description: It includes a type of material the model should use to generate the image

samples.text: An astronaut lounging in a tropical resort in space, {style} on a {material-type}
A {style} of an astronaut walking in a green desert
